ai-patthana17.29:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.29:1.1_0: Not seeing the result of impingement, not for the result of past lives. That doesn’t give rise to repulsion.
ai-patthana17.29:2.1_0: Not seeing the result of in someone who has causes and reasons, not by legitimate means, and with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana17.29:3.1_0: One who has no difficulty in doing not give rise to an imperturbable way, who has no shaking off discomfort in line with that condition.
ai-patthana17.29:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
